name: Flappy Bii game
description:
Available for OS X, Ubuntu, Debian, Raspberry Pi and Windows. 

It's a Flappy Bii game developed with biicode using Box2D and GLUI libraries.

To play Flappy Bii on any OS, follow these steps:

  • If it's the first time you use biicode, install it, and execute:
    • ~$ bii setup:cpp
  • Execute these commands:

~$ bii init flappy_bii

~$ cd flappy_bii

~/flappy_bii$ bii open xunty/flappy_bii

~/flappy_bii$ bii cpp:build

  • Execute the game and fly the bee as far as you can without hitting a tree!
